title: 86/480/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 September 1986 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1986 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 18 September 1986
approving the programme of measures submitted by the Greek Government for 1986 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(86/480/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Greece submitted by the Greek Government for 1986 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Greek Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 September 1986.
For the Commission
Alois PFEIFFER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 191, 23. 7. 1985, p. 53.
